featured.text: The native greeted the travelers in a language which was strange to them.
The monkey house has a strange fascination.
In fact, it tasted very strange...
Tom: Who do you ask in a strange town?

other.text: This situation is so strange to us that we do not know what will __(29)__ of it.
They all have blond hair and “strange eyes.”

definition.en_def: Unusual or surprising in a way that is unsettling or hard to understand.
definition.example: The strange noise coming from the attic made her feel uneasy.
